definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The box can go on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 这个盒子可以放在搁板上。

sentences.english: The box that the fur came out of was on the bed.
sentences.chinese: 装狐皮围巾的那只盒子放在床上。

sentences.english: Bring a lunch in a box.
sentences.chinese: 把午饭盛到一个盒子里。

sentences.english: Reuse and recycle. Re-purpose plastic containers and cardboard boxes where you can.
sentences.chinese: 在你能够的地方重复使用塑料容器和硬纸板盒子。

sentences.english: Some buses in Beijing have a box near a box near the driver.
sentences.chinese: 北京的公交车在司机的附近有个盒子。

sentences.english: The box is bigger than that one.
sentences.chinese: 这个盒子比那个盒了大。

sentences.english: Electro valves installed in a box.
sentences.chinese: 电动阀安装在一个盒子内。

sentences.english: The Hada Cake looks like a round casket.
sentences.chinese: 哈达火烧的形状像上下合在一起的小圆盒子。

sentences.english: What are we really putting in these boxes?
sentences.chinese: 在这些盒子里到底放的是什么？

sentences.english: However, many mooncake buyers expressed their dismay at the overly-elaborated boxes.
sentences.chinese: 然而许多月饼买家对过分精美的盒子表示了不满。

sentences.english: Black boxes make it tough to reverse-engineer the equipment.
sentences.chinese: “黑盒子”手法使得中方难以对设备进行反向开发。

sentences.english: So Portia had to show the three boxes to him.
sentences.chinese: 因此波西亚只得把那三只盒子拿给他看。

sentences.english: The aroma is a complex mix of blackcurrant with liquor ice and violets with hints of a cigar box.
sentences.chinese: 香气是一种混合黑醋栗带有紫罗兰和雪茄盒子的感觉。

sentences.english: The top of this box won't lift (off).
sentences.chinese: 这个盒子的盖揭不起来。

sentences.english: Do you know how to open the box?
sentences.chinese: 你知道如何打开这盒子吗？

sentences.english: Thurston cut off these false heads and put the birds in the box.
sentences.chinese: 瑟斯顿切下这些假脑袋然后把鸟们放进盒子。

definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
